title: I Can Handle This!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Hey~ Mia-chan, are you feeling okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I did a practice routine that Kanan made......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hell triathlon level three?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, that’s not it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>It was a routine that Ruby told me about. She said it’s what Aqours usually does for their training.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>So you’re feeling down because of how tired you are?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’m feeling fine, and I’m not tired! ......I’m just thinking really hard about today’s practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I see, I see~ Hey Mia-chan. We still have time before the club meeting, so would you take a nap with Kanata-chan? Please~ ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>......I guess it can’t be helped. But only for a little bit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Thanks~ Come on, get over here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
